c1.name: "Can the Happiest of Spirits Understand Anxiety?"
c1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Rebound Hydrotherapy</color>'s Bolstering Bubblebalm can bounce 3 extra times, and the first 3 bounces will not cause big Bubblebalms to become smaller.
The Ascension Talent "Requires Appropriate Rest" is enhanced: Each Bubblebalm bounce adds 1 stack to her Convalescence tally, and the values for the Convalescence stacks' DMG bonus will be modified to: Every 1,000 max HP Sigewinne has above 30,000 increases the DMG by 100. The maximum DMG increase for Elemental Skills that can be gained in this way is 3,500. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Requires Appropriate Rest."
c1.description:
Rebound Hydrotherapy's Bolstering Bubblebalm can bounce 3 extra times, and the first 3 bounces will not cause big Bubblebalms to become smaller.
The Ascension Talent "Requires Appropriate Rest" is enhanced: Each Bubblebalm bounce adds 1 stack to her Convalescence tally, and the values for the Convalescence stacks' DMG bonus will be modified to: Every 1,000 max HP Sigewinne has above 30,000 increases the DMG by 100. The maximum DMG increase for Elemental Skills that can be gained in this way is 3,500. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Requires Appropriate Rest."

c2.name: "Can the Most Merciful of Spirits Defeat Its Foes?"
c2.descriptionRaw:
When using <color=#FFD780FF>Rebound Hydrotherapy</color> and <color=#FFD780FF>Super Saturated Syringing</color>, Sigewinne can create a Bubbly Shield worth 30% of her Max HP that absorbs <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> with 250% efficiency. The Bubbly Shield will persist until Sigewinne finishes using relevant skills.
Additionally, after Rebound Hydrotherapy's Bolstering Bubblebalm or Super Saturated Syringing hits an opponent, that opponent's <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro RES</color> will be decreased by 35% for 8s.

Additionally, after Rebound Hydrotherapy's Bolstering Bubblebalm or Super Saturated Syringing hits an opponent, that opponent's Hydro RES will be decreased by 35% for 8s.

c3.name: "Can the Healthiest of Spirits Cure Fevers?"
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Rebound Hydrotherapy</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Rebound Hydrotherapy by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: "Can the Loveliest of Spirits Keep Decay at Bay?"
c4.descriptionRaw: The duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Super Saturated Syringing</color> is extended by 3s.
c4.description: The duration of Super Saturated Syringing is extended by 3s.

c5.name: "Can the Most Joyful of Spirits Alleviate Agony?"
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Super Saturated Syringing</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Super Saturated Syringing by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: "Can the Most Radiant of Spirits Pray For Me?"
c6.descriptionRaw: When Sigewinne performs healing, she will increase the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of her <color=#FFD780FF>Super Saturated Syringing</color> based on her Max HP. Every 1,000 Max HP she has will increase CRIT Rate by 0.4% and CRIT DMG by 2.2% for 15s. The maximum increase achievable this way is 20% CRIT Rate and 110% CRIT DMG.
